comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "Walter S. Brown [photographer] (d.1942) began his career at Oregon Agricultural College in 1913 as an Extension Horticulturist. Prior to his work for the college, Brown served as president and manager of the Corvallis Orchard Company. In 1920, Brown became head of the Horticulture Department." — OSU Archives
